design_philosophy.core_concept: Fusion of rugged automotive reliability with the vibrant cultural heritage of Ethiopia. A 'Dark Mode' first aesthetic that feels premium, technical, and trusted.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Bento-grid layouts, high-contrast typography, glassmorphism overlays, and subtle Ethiopian pattern accents.

buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-white border border-slate-600 font-medium py-3 px-6 rounded-sm

images.description: Ethiopian mountain road - represents the journey and terrain.
Artistic Car Engine - represents the core product.
Mechanic working - represents service and expertise.

visual_assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons for a more technical look.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry.
Use glassmorphism with backdrop-blur-xl for sticky headers.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Prioritize Shadcn UI components but customize them to match the 'Addis Industrial' theme.
Never use transparent backgrounds on headers without a blur/scrim.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'One Page' feel by using a sticky navigation bar that smooth-scrolls to sections (Hero, Featured, Categories, About). Use a 'Sheet' or 'Dialog' for the Cart and Login to avoid leaving the main experience. Dashboards should be separate routes but share the same visual DNA.
